summary: AIR CONDITIONER POTENTIALLY LEAKING FREON INTO PASSENGER COMPARTMENT.    WHILE DRIVING AROUND NOTICED LITE FOG/SMOKE COMING THROUGH AIR VENTS INTO PASSENGER COMPARTMENT (NOT OBSERVED THIS BEFORE AND WINDOWS WERE CLOSED).  20 MINUTES LATER AIR CONDITIONER STARTED BLOWING WARM AIR.  LATER THAT WEEK FOUND OUT AIR CONDITIONER EVAPORATOR COIL HAD LEAKED RENDERING THE AIR CONDITIONING UNUSABLE.  MILEAGE AT TIME OF OCCURANCE ~12,255 MILES.  ALSO NOTICED A LOT OF 2015 MODEL CARS WITH SIMILAR FAILURE MODE
